channel.title: Help ASAP [pi]
channel.description:
alright so im making a dl client and everythign worked fine until i jarred it. so i put my class files and cache, sprites, raw, and sign in there and made a jar. when i click the jar the screen pops up but goes and says this.....
[IMG]http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab42/omfgstfunoob/Error3-1.jpg[/img]
if you wanna try it for your self please tell me if it loads up (you wont beable to log in cause the ip is local host) just tell me if it loads
http://uppit.com/vnjjqlf5ccek/client.jar

item.title: Help ASAP [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Dutch Owner Dutch
item.description:
@Owner_Dutch wrote:

Read The Tips Very Good, And U Need Java so make sure u got it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help ASAP [pi]
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

  1. If this error occurs, then you havent set the paths evrywhere.
  2. You dont jar the cache into it.
  3. You need to take the Cache out of the folder before jarring client. In tutorial theres "The jar file should be around 600kb (sometimes if bigger client comes like 1mb). + You need to put the Raw and all Models folder to the Cache folder only dont put javazoom(if you have) and sign.

Read full topic

item.title: Help ASAP [pi]
item.dc:creator: @vrac_defiled vrac defiled
item.description:
@vrac_defiled wrote:

umm jarring is only needed for webclients?

You don’t jar a regular client

in other words, you let your dl client as is, no jarring or signing needed

Read full topic
